| History                 = The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey is the joint venture between [[New York (State)|New York]] and [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]] that regulates the infrastructure of the Port of New York and New Jersey. The Port Authority got into a dispute with [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Mayor Wilson Fisk]] with Mayor Fisk being quoted as telling the Port Authority's inspectors to "Drop dead."{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 609}}
